databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.NAME , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.YUKO , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.SHOW_ORDER , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.DELETE_FLAG , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.SEND_FLAG , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.VESSEL_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.DATA_NO , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.USER_KEY , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.RENEW_DATE , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.TS FROM MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE
WHERE MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.DELETE_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.SHOW_ORDER, MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE.MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID

INSERT INTO MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE( MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID , NAME , YUKO , SHOW_ORDER , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID , :NAME , :YUKO , :SHOW_ORDER , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE SET NAME = :NAME , YUKO = :YUKO , SHOW_ORDER = :SHOW_ORDER , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS WHERE MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID = :MS_SI_KYUYO_TEATE_ID
